DBZ Abridged Joke Explanation Thing
  • Home
  • About

DBZ Abridged ranks right up there with The Simpsons and Futurama, IMHO. Naturally, it contains lots of obscure jokes which you'd have to scour the internet for minutes to find explanations for. In an effort to utilize my obsession with this show, I have pillaged the abridged forums and watched every episode like 50 times to provide this content

Please send any comments/suggestions/feedback to kmurph73@gmail.com or the github repo. Thanks!
